name: Jinx
title: the Loose Cannon
lore: A manic and impulsive criminal from Zaun, Jinx lives to wreak havoc without care for the consequences. With an arsenal of deadly weapons, she unleashes the loudest blasts and brightest explosions to leave a trail of mayhem and panic in her wake. Jinx despises boredom, and gleefully brings her own chaotic brand of pandemonium wherever she goes.
blurb: A manic and impulsive criminal from Zaun, Jinx lives to wreak havoc without care for the consequences. With an arsenal of deadly weapons, she unleashes the loudest blasts and brightest explosions to leave a trail of mayhem and panic in her wake. Jinx...
allytips: Rockets aren't always the best choice! Jinx's minigun is incredibly powerful when fully ramped up. Switch to it whenever an enemy champion gets too close.
Jinx's rockets deal full damage to all enemies in the explosion. Use them on minions in lane to hit nearby enemy champions without drawing minion aggro.
When a fight starts try to stay on the edge of fray by poking with rockets and Zap!. Do not run in and unload with the minigun until you feel it is safe.
enemytips: Jinx's minigun takes time to ramp up. If you see her poking with rockets try to jump on her and burst her down.
Jinx's ultimate does less damage the closer you are to her.
Jinx's snare grenades have a long cooldown and are her primary means of protecting herself. If she misses with them she will have a hard time escaping if engaged upon.

riot_spell_q.name: Switcheroo!
riot_spell_q.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, drain Mana, and scale {{ e5 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ e1 }}%.

Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

riot_spell_w.name: Zap!
riot_spell_w.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Zap!'s cast time decreases as Jinx gains Attack Speed.

riot_spell_e.name: Flame Chompers!
riot_spell_e.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and stopping in-progress movement abilities on the spot before dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
riot_spell_r.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
riot_spell_r.tooltip: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ damagefloor }} to {{ damagemax }} Physical Damage plus {{ percentdamage }}% of the target's missing Health. Nearby enemies take 80% Damage.

riot_spell_i.name: Get Excited!
riot_spell_i.description: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Get Excited!
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy [[champion]], [[decoy]], [[turret]] or [[inhibitor]] dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by '''Jinx''', she gains {{sti|ms|{{as|175% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} which decays over 6 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: Additionally, she gains {{sti|{{as|15% '''total''' attack speed}}}} and removes the attack speed cap for the same duration.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Switcheroo!
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|{{cci|Pow-Pow.png|Jinx#Pow-Pow|Pow-Pow}} - Passive:}} '''Jinx's''' [[basic attack]]s make her ''{{ai|Rev'd up}}'' for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, granting {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, stacking up to 3 times.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: {{sbc|{{cci|Fishbones.png|Jinx#Fishbones|Fishbones}} - Toggle:}} '''Jinx''' loses {{sti|{{as|25% of her '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and her basic attacks cost {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}. They gain {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}}, deal {{as|10% AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}, and hit all enemies near the main target. The bonus damage from ''Fishbones'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|10% {{critical damage|10}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: The first ''Rev'd up'' stack is twice as potent as the others, and stacks decay one at a time when she stops attacking. ''Fishbones'' will not refresh the stack timer and only its first basic attack after using ''Switcheroo!'' will gain the bonus attack speed.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* '''Jinx's''' first attack after switching to {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} can be triggered after {{fd|0.4}} seconds, instead of using the attack timer.
* Toggling ''Switcheroo!'' is '''not''' considered an activation for the purposes of {{sbc|{{nie|Spellblade}}}}.
* Despite '''Jinx''' starting the game using {{ai|Pow-Pow||''Pow-Pow''}} she doesn't receive any bonus attack speed until ''Switcheroo!'' is unlocked.
* {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} splash damage affects structures (minions will target '''Jinx''') but does not affect targets if '''Jinx's''' attacks are {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, or if they {{tip|blind|miss}}.
* {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} attack cost is deducted before {{iis|Muramana}} {{sbc|{{nie|Shock}}}} damage is calculated.
* With {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{ai|Pow-Pow||''Pow-Pow''}} generates one stack per enemy hit.
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} additional bolts apply {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones' ''}}splash damage (which will stack with {{sbc|{{nie|Wind's Fury}}}}).
* Both weapons apply [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}. {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones's ''}}bonus damage also applies {{sti|life steal}}.
* {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} and {{ai|Pow-Pow||''Pow-Pow''}} only apply on-hit effects to the primary target (this applies to {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} and to {{ai|Fishbones|}} splash damage).
** Damage for {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}}: {{as|110% AD}} (100% + 10%).
** Critical strike damage for {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}}: {{as|220% AD}} ((100% + 10%){{times}}2).
** Critical strike damage for {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}: {{as|247.5% AD}} ((100% + 10%){{times}}2.25).
** Damage per {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|bolt}}: {{as|44% AD}} ((100% + 10%){{times}}{{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|{{fd|0.4}}}}).
** Critical strike damage per {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|bolt}}: {{as|88% AD}} (((100% + 10%){{times}}{{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|{{fd|0.4}}}}){{times}}2).
** Critical strike damage per {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|bolt}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}: {{as|99% AD}} (((100% + 10%){{times}}{{ii|Runaan's Hurricane|{{fd|0.4}}}}){{times}}2.25).
** Potential damage on stacked enemies with {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} and {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}: {{as|198% AD}} (110% + 44% + 44%).
** Potential critical strike damage on stacked enemies with {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}} and {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}: {{as|396% AD}} (220% + 88% + 88%).
** Potential critical strike damage on stacked enemies with {{ai|Fishbones||''Fishbones''}}, {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}, and {{ii|Infinity Edge}}: {{as|445.5% AD}} ((247.5% + 99% + 99%)).

wikia_skill_w1.name: Zap!
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{pp|11|0.6 to 0.4|0 to 250|key1=%|type='''bonus''' attack speed|color=attack speed}} seconds, '''Jinx''' fires a shock blast that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy it hits, {{tip|sight|revealing}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Flame Chompers!
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jinx''' tosses out 3 Chompers that arm after {{fd|0.7}} seconds and explode after 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} over {{fd|1.5}} seconds to all enemies within a small area.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 270}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Magic Damage per instance|{{ap|70/3 to 270/3|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|33.{{Recurring|3}}}}% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description2: ''Chompers'' prematurely explode on {{tip|champion|enemy champion}} contact, {{tip|knockdown|knocking down}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for the same duration. A champion can set off only a single Chomper and be damaged by one.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Flame Chompers!'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Jinx's'' movement.
* ''Chompers'' will halt when encountering {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jinx''' fires a [[File:Super Mega Death Rocket! Minimap.png|20px|link=]] rocket in the target direction that explodes upon enemy champion contact, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to them and 80% of the amount to nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: The rocket deals {{pp|16|type=distance traveled|key=%|10 to 100|0 to 1500|formula=10% (+6% per 100 units travelled). The damage increase is capped at 1500 units.}} of its damage based on distance traveled, though the {{as|'''missing''' health}} component is unaffected.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2:
{{st|Min. Physical Damage|{{ap|25|35|45}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25|30|35}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Max. Physical Damage|{{ap|250|350|450}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|25|30|35}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Min. Secondary Damage|{{ap|20|28|36}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20|24|28}}% of target's '''missing''' health}}|Max. Secondary Damage|{{ap|200|280|360}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20|24|28}}% of target's '''missing''' health}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.speed: {{ap|{{tt|1500|Initial rocket speed over 1 second}}|{{tt|2500|Maximum rocket speed (estimated)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * {{tip|Spell Shield}} will block the impact damage, but will not prevent the explosion.
